destination.shortDescription: New York is a vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks and bustling nightlife. It offers a diverse range of entertainment and dining options
destination.shortHistory: New York City was founded in 1624 and has since become one of the most influential cities in the world.

program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Start your day with a hearty brunch and refreshing drinks at this cozy cafe in Greenwich Village.
Stroll through the picturesque Central Park, visit Bethesda Terrace, and enjoy the natural beauty of the park.

program.programOrPlaceName: Happy Hour at Bar SixtyFive at Rainbow Room
program.location: 30 Rockefeller Plaza, 65th Floor, New York, NY 10112
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Experience an upscale happy hour with panoramic views of the city skyline from the top of the Rockefeller Center.
Enjoy a trendy dining experience at this famous restaurant known for its eclectic decor and delicious food.
Experience the vibrant nightlife of New York at the popular bars and clubs in the trendy Meatpacking District.
